eg.ui

Class TabbedPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ui.TabbedPane

  • public class TabbedPane
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a JTabbedPane with a (close) button in the tabs.

    A button indended for closing tabs is passed in the method addNewTab(String, Component, JButton, int). The button is expected to have an ActionListener added to it. To detect which tab is selected for closing the method iTabMouseOver() is called.
